long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automates scrolling and collecting contacts you can connect with on LinkedIn.

=== How to Use It? ===

1. Navigate to LinkedIn.com

2. Search for any company name in the search bar and go to the company page

3. Click on "people" (URL must be "www.linkedin.com/company/<any company>/people")

For example: "https://www.linkedin.com/company/google/people/"

4. Click on the extension and press "start"

5. Let the extension run until it has gone through all of the people on the page or press "stop" whenever

6. Click "download" to download the CSV file with data
